instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: ...Oh well hello there my child! My name is Felina! I'm a witch but you needn't worry! I'm not a mean witch... at least that's what Rana tells me.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: Although I believe this is our first meeting, I must say you possess a certain aura that intrigues me... May I perform a palm reading?

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: Alright then! Just let me take a closer look now.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: hmm...

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: Alright, I think I have seen quite enough!

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: Oh, I see...

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: That was the reaction I was expecting as we are still practically strangers. But who knows? One day you may warm up to me Just as dear Rana has!

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: Anyways, Have you any further questions for me?

responses.text: So are you like... a furry?

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: W-what?? A 'furry'? n-no!!

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: I am a half-tabaxi... My father was human and my mother was a full-tabaxi. Making me an actual black cat witch! At least until the grey hairs start showing up.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: Apprentice? Hmm... I'm not entirely sure about your current aptitude. Being a witch is not for everyone and I don't know if you truly have what it takes.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: But... if I were to give you a chance do you truly think you could prove yourself?

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: Oh so you're up to the task? Very well. Then I have quest for you!

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: I'm running a bit low on lapis lazuli, which I require for making enchantments. If you head for the caves and find me 32 lapis lazuli then I could make you my apprentice

instances.speaker: mcrpg:rana
instances.message: Hiya guys! I was overhearin' u guyses conversation and I-

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: Rana! What have I told you about eavesdropping!?

instances.speaker: mcrpg:rana
instances.message: I-I'm so sorry abuela! I just wanted to know if I could go with PLAYERNAME on POS_SINGLE quest? I think I wanna get out of the house more! ^.^

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: Well I can't say I love that idea. But you are an adult now so if you get you get POS_SINGLE permission then I suppose I can't say no

instances.speaker: mcrpg:rana
instances.message: Yayy!!! I'm soooo excited we're gonna have so much fun!!! And when we get back, we can make friendship bracelets!! :>

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: Oh and PLAYERNAME might I ask you to please keep an eye on her? Rana is all I have left in this world so please try to keep her safe.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:rana
instances.message: Wait really? I was so looking forward to this tho. I thought we'd have so much fun and would make friendship bracelets when we got back.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: Oh Rana there's no need to cry dear!

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: I'm so sorry about her she just got a little excited as we don't get many visitors, She even hasn't met anyone new since she moved in with me.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: I'll cheer her up later with cookies, that always works. That usually works!

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.message: Alright then. Adi√≥s my child!
